website_summaries.verdict: A basic 14-piece set with some unique extras. Particularly useful if strong magnetized bits are important to you.
pros: Also has a handy magnetizer to refresh the magnetic force of the bits
cons: Y bit for iPhone 7 particularly sensitive to stripping
Pouch to hold the tools not very durable

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these tools. I would recommend them to anyone who works on phone
customer_reviews.author: Juice

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need is included
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed everything you will need for the job is included for a great price came quickly
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Wylie

customer_reviews.title: A must for Iphone 7
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. While this is cheap for a pair of tools it sure beats the free included tools that come with most screens. The magnetic pull is strong and be turned off with the yellow base. The size gives you more leverage. I have yet to strip any tools using this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Orderd a new screen and the tools that came with it were wrong and horrible. This tool kit works perfect for iPhone 7 (and others I’m sure)!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy these more than the ones that come with the replacement screens. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set to fix my iPhone 7 Plus. It had done a good job. Prepare a set of repair tools for phone is necessary
customer_reviews.author: Leo Ma

customer_reviews.title: Did the job well.
customer_reviews.text: Needed the tripoint screwdriver to change an IPhone screen. For the price I couldn’t pass this set up. Not only did the tripoint do its job, the others came in handy too - changed the screen in just under an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I am not a professional so I don’t use this every day but I used it once to open my iPhone and worked well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dikmen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality tools
customer_reviews.text: These tools are good quality. It comes with the try tip screw driver, tore, case pic, etc... everything you need and better quality then the screen replacement kit tools.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and fits all parts of iPhone 7 Screen replacement
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Worked for all the screws I needed to remove to replace the screen on an iPhone 7.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great tool with a handy magnetic to hold all those ...
customer_reviews.text: I have fixed many iphones and devices in the past. These are great tool with a handy magnetic to hold all those small screws. The "Y" screw tool work well with iPhone 7 that use this screw type. The mold of of these tool are good quality. Fit just right on any mobile devices screw. A must for people who like to repair mobile device.
customer_reviews.author: PeevXwm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent quality! my hubby replaced my iPhone screen flawlessly lol
customer_reviews.author: Churka

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I looked all over town for these and couldn't find them anywhere. They work great and I love the magnetizer/demagnetizer.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Osteen

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the default tools that come with other replacement kits
customer_reviews.text: Tool kit was easy to use; all the tools fit the Iphone 7 screws perfectly. The tops spin so you can hold pressure down on the top and spin the base to get the screws in and out. So much better than the tools that come with replacement screens that don’t work and leave you with sore fingers trying to replace your screen or make other repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Edwards

customer_reviews.title: These are great quality! Perfect for fixing iPhones on the side
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality! Perfect for fixing iPhones on the side. They have a great weight to them and the magnetizer that comes with it is helpful as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D Edison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING - these fit and work perfectly, incredible quality, and work great for all screws in the iPhone 7+
customer_reviews.author: Troy M.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Tool
customer_reviews.text: Tool is made of a metal that I highly resistant to impact. Magnetic tool also works well.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M.

customer_reviews.title: The pentalobe screwdriver snapped off and stripped my screw on the first one
customer_reviews.text: As I said in the title, the pentalobe screwdriver snapped off and then twisted stripping the screw the very first time I used it. I now no longer can repair my personal device after having done dozens of repairs for myself and others. To rub salt in the wound, after getting frustrated, I left the drivers out, and my dog chewed a couple of them, so now I can't even return the piece of crap. My advice: buy somewhere else. The reason I am giving it two stars instead of one is that the phillips head worked flawlessly for many screws, so that's great.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Barra

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Literally broke from less than half a pound ot torque...
customer_reviews.author: Those Guys Electronicz

customer_reviews.title: The tool kit is good for small and very tiny screws
customer_reviews.text: The product is as advertised. The screwdriver tips are sharp edge especially for the Phillips screwdriver. Make sure proper pressure is applied when unscrewing otherwise you can damage the screw head. The magnetizer and demagnetizer works. My only issue I have is with the plastic bag that holds the items began to undo in the seams at several edges. Other than this, I am able to use it on my point and shoot camera with PH#0000 screws and prying open my headphones including the torx screws. I still need to get to replace my iPhone battery. The tool kit is good for small and very tiny screws.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Poor durability.  Plastic pieces break easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit so I could replace an iPhone charging port. While I did accomplish my task the plastic pry bar broke when minimal pressure was applied while removing the phone battery. I reached to pull the other one out of the bag just to discover that it was already in 3 pieces. So either these aren’t strong enough to survive shipping or I got someone else’s return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set of tools for the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set of tools to replace my iPhone 7 screen. First time ever attempting to do such thing. This set of tools was for sure crucial to being able to fix my phone. I used just about all the tools. The screwdriver set is real good quality. I will say the suction was not good/strong enough for me. Thankfully the set comes with this real nice thin metal spatula/pen tool, which did the job perfectly in replacement of the suction cup. A hot blow dryer is very helpful. The plastic pry-sptaulas were also very strong and helpful. Overall, great set for opening up and fixing an IPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Updated - pentalobe screwdriver is stripped
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had a chance to use it but the quality looks great. Update 11/30 - I’ve only used the tools about 6 times for different repairs and the Pentalobe screwdriver has completely stripped. I had to use the “cheap” screwdriver that came with the screen I ordered. I hope the seller can contact me to offer a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Alain C.

customer_reviews.title: No gurantee
customer_reviews.text: Maybe if you were a pro at opening phones this would work but you could damage the phone just by opening the phone. Luckily I found out I had insurance on the phone and did not have to count on using this kit to put a new battery in it. If I were to have a battery problem again. Keep the insurance!!! I would not want to chance breaking the phone trying to replace the battery. I was there with the technician replacing the battery and she did everything she was supposed to do but it still did not work when put back together.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl P. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Soposed to be for iphone 7 kit. No flat head screwdriver
customer_reviews.text: Kit is ok. But does NOT contain all screwdrivers for the iPhone 7. The 7 has a flat head screws and this kit did not contain a flat head. Whole reason I bought this kit was to have all components.
customer_reviews.author: Kx101

customer_reviews.title: These screwdrivers WORK!!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes!! This is the set you need! Tried using what came with my replacement screen (iPhone 7), and the Y-tip screwdriver in particular wasn't working at all. So, I looked around and found good comments about this Esdabem set, and ordered it. Where the cheap y-tip had just spun on the screws, the Esdabem Y-tip bit right into the screw and took it out with NO problems. The other two drivers also had great grip. Comes with LOTS of extra tools. I've thrown away all the tools that came with replacement screens, and I'm keeping this one for sure. DO NOT BUY ANY OTHER BRAND--THIS IS THE ONE YOU ARE LOOKING FOR!
customer_reviews.author: M. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great and not so great...
customer_reviews.text: First of all, let me say that this kit is certainly worth the money. The drivers are fabulous, very comfortable to hold and smooth rotating. However, due to my own stupidity, I broke the tip off of the pentalobe driver the first time I used it and had to order another kit. The opening picks are extremely soft and flimsy, and gouge and break with no problem. I would advise using these tools very carefully and you should be able to complete your task with minimal effort.
customer_reviews.author: Junko Plavsic

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool set
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased this little tool set to fix my iPhone. I was very impressed when he took them all out of the packaging as all the sets I had seen recommended looked cheap and mainly plastic. Not this set, this set is like the deluxe model, they are mainly metal tools that seem fairly heavy duty. They helped fix my phone beautifully and I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a good thing. But I don't know how to discuss it. I just want to clean up the review. Because when I look at the review which hasn't reviewed that I will feel uncomfortable. That's it.
customer_reviews.author: Yima

customer_reviews.title: Won’t get what you need...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the kit specifically for the .6x25 mm screw driver. I received the kit today and it has everything except the .6x25mm screwdriver. Out a phone for another week while I wait on another order. Thanks for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Flatness

customer_reviews.title: Missing Tool
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tool kit to replace the lighting connector assembly in my iPhone 7plus. Tool didn’t come with the tri-point Y head screwdriver, instead I received 2 Phillips head screwdriver. It’s not a complete kit like they said, still need a tiny flat screwdriver to remove the standoff screw. If you looking for a tool kit to rework on an iPhone or do a specific job like I did then this kit is not the right one.
customer_reviews.author: JVN

customer_reviews.title: Makes swapping out battery relatively easy
customer_reviews.text: The appropriate tools fitted their intended screw heads. Swap was very quick and quite easy. One additional wide pry tool would have made breaking the battery loose from the adhesive easier. I resorted to the method of pulling the adhesive out from under the battery. Also quite easy but one has to know this technique.
customer_reviews.author: rudyk2evy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Quality is poor. The magnetic pull is weak. Screwdrivers won’t even pick up the screws. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for a decent price, was able to fix my iPhone XS max by myself. Tools are also magnetic which is a huge plus
customer_reviews.author: Shan Kulkarni

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set for hobby use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, everything performs as it should! The sharp ends of some of the tools easily pierce the package, so you'll want to find these a place in something more fit for the purpose, but that's really not why i bought the tools.
customer_reviews.author: TurboTumor

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love it .. everything i needed to repair my phone
customer_reviews.author: shantel

customer_reviews.title: Not all the screwdrivers are magnetic.
customer_reviews.text: I wish all the screwdrivers were magnetic, but everything else is perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Tools worked well for fixing broken phone screens.
customer_reviews.text: Tools worked well for fixing broken phone screens. Fast shipping too.

customer_reviews.title: Too bad there isn’t a complete set like this that you don’t have to hunt down
customer_reviews.text: They work very well, the screw driver set of 3 is really what I wanted, though that magnetize tool is really nice to have. Worth getting.

customer_reviews.title: Very good screw drivers
customer_reviews.text: These screw drivers are good and works well for iphone 7.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to repair iPhones and iPods. Work great and good price

customer_reviews.text: Very good quality set it fits the screws well and is a lasting a while.

customer_reviews.title: This is the repair kit you need!
customer_reviews.text: I fix phones on a weekly basis, and this kit hasn't failed me. I've had cheaper kits fall apart on me, but this one seems to do the job well. Screwdrivers are all still functional after being used on ~10 phone repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Solid tools, poor container
customer_reviews.text: Tools seem quality, haven’t used yet. But the zip container is cheap and came ripped open at the ends with tools falling out. See pics.

customer_reviews.title: Keep moving

customer_reviews.title: Decent kit for fixing iPhone.
customer_reviews.text: The tools needed were all there! Unfortunately, we couldn't fix our iPhone. But if you need to, and can, this tool kit is a must!

customer_reviews.title: A must-have
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these tools is excellent. They stay magnetized and do not feel flimsy, unlike the tools that are given in phone screen replacement kits. I was able to replace my screen incredibly quickly. This kit is a must for anyone that wants to replace their screen by themselves.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality tools
customer_reviews.text: Suction cups not that great but the rest of the tools are amazing. Great quality.

customer_reviews.title: Got a Used set

customer_reviews.title: Very good deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: This worked very well for our needs and had all the tools to do it yourself with repairing iPhones

customer_reviews.title: Great set to have
customer_reviews.text: Great set to have. The drivers that come with screen replacements are usually very bad. This set allowed me to repair an iphone 7 with no problems.

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality for the price. Would recommend this to anyone looking for a decent and affordable set of iPhone repair tools

customer_reviews.title: everything you need to get into your phone - knowledge to repair not included
customer_reviews.text: I have had no problem - have repaired two iphones with it. I like the tool that magnetizes/demagnetizes the screwdrivers. Comes with a handy pouch to keep everything together.

customer_reviews.title: High quality tools
customer_reviews.text: Tools are very durable and have got me through a couple dozen of phone repairs. The only thing you’re really missing is a magnet mat to sort all your screws. Other than that you’re all set to go.

customer_reviews.title: Quality metal tools!
customer_reviews.text: This kit worked perfect for my repair! All the metal tools were good quality! The plastic case did have some punctures upon arrival, but all tools were intact.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The screwdrivers are fine and work alright, sometimes the rubber rings can come dislodged. However, the plastic pry tools broke on the first use, not durable at all. For the price, I guess this is an alright deal.

customer_reviews.title: Good tools
customer_reviews.text: These tools do their job. They are pretty good. very simple.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money

customer_reviews.title: good tools but no case. S&H little pricey

customer_reviews.text: Item ordered was item received. These tools got the job done and did not strip out or break. Would recommend these if you need to replace screens on your iPhone.

customer_reviews.text: First day it was working well, the second day it started stripping all the screws. Good for one time use. Should have mentioned that.

customer_reviews.title: Have stripped screws? Try these
customer_reviews.text: These worked great! The set I was using was stripping the tri-point screws, so I decided to try these. They worked great! These have a nice sharp tip which made it easy to take out what I thought were stripped screws. The magnetizer also helped a lot.

product_meta.title: Esdabem Repair Tool Kit for iPhone 7 - Complete Premium Opening Pry Tool Kits with Titanium Alloy Screwdriver Set for iPhone X/8/8 Plus,7plus, 6Plus / 6S /6/5S/5/5C/4S/4/SE, iPod, iTouch
feature_bullets: Professional iPhone 7/7Plus repair tool kits: to repair your iPhone, Apple iPhone 7, iPhone 7plus, iPhone 6Plus, iPhone 6S /6/5S/5/5C/4S/4/SE, iPod, iTouch,and more smart phone
16 Pack tool kit: allow you to take apart of your Apple iPhone mobile devices without damage to phone cover

High Quality:Premium Screwdriver is made of Aviation Aluminum Alloy material, high hardness Gold-plated Screw head, Anti-drop design, our screwdriver can be used long time, not like other fake or bad quality tool
Ergonomic design: more convenient and efficient, easy to use. Magnetize stand - Only need 3 seconds magnetize, screwdriver can get 3 days magnetic

Warranty: 24 months warranty to ensure good quality and service. Note: A technician or expert is recommanded for the installation, our company is not responsible for any damage caused by installation of this accessory.
